title: Searches
text:
Introduction
This site contains the searches performed on the various databases.
It also contains a listing of literature found.

title: 1  Summary
text: x databases queries resulting in 115 items.

title: 2  Databases Searched
text: For a description of OpenAlex see Priem, Piwowar, and Orr (2022).↩︎

title: 3  List of eligible journals
text:

Next to the basket of 11 there are other journals that are of interest. BISE is of interest because it is an european (IS) journal (as is EJIS). BPMJ and IJDG may be of interest given the subject matter their titles refer to.

title: 5  Literature Identified
text:
The tables below show records found. Seq (sequence) shows a table row number. Source shows the data source where the record was found. Type holds the type of publication (conference proceedings, journal article, preprint, etc.) Title is the title of the publication. EC (exclusion criterion) shows the reason a record is excluded. If a record is excluded for multiple reasons, only one reason is shown. QA (quality assessment) shows the QA-score the record obtainted (0-4).
